content:
The following steps might be helpful: 1. Tap hamburger button (three horizontal bars) on the top left corner. 2. Tap the email account you want to configure from the list of accounts on the left side of Thunderbird for Android. If you do not see the list, tap "Show accounts" located near the bottom of Thunderbird for Android. 3. Tap "Manage folders" located near the bottom of Thunderbird for Android. 4. Tap the folder you want to configure. 5. Tick "Unify (All messages are shown in Unified Inbox)" to make the messages in this folder appear in Unified Inbox. 6. (I am not sure whether this step is necessary or not.) Close Thunderbird for Android, and then open Thunderbird for Android again.

Now, the messages in the folder which you configured in step 4 and step 5 should appear in Unified Inbox.
